V

vector - package vector
Provides classes which are treated as structures to represent vectors in the second to fourth dimension
Vector2D - Class in vector
Represents a vector in the 2 dimensional-plane.
Vector2D(double, double) - Constructor for class vector.Vector2D
Initialize 2D vector with x and y coordinate.
Vector2D() - Constructor for class vector.Vector2D
Initialize 2D vector with x and y coordinate as 0.
Vector3D - Class in vector
Represents a vector in the 3 dimensional-space.
Vector3D(double, double, double) - Constructor for class vector.Vector3D
Initialize 3D vector with x, y and z coordinate.
Vector3D() - Constructor for class vector.Vector3D
Initialize 3D vector with x, y and z coordinate as 0.
Vector4D - Class in vector
Represents a vector in the 4 dimensional-hyperspace.
Vector4D(double, double, double, double) - Constructor for class vector.Vector4D
Initialize 4D vector with x, y, z and w coordinate.
Vector4D(Vector4D) - Constructor for class vector.Vector4D
Initialize 4D vector with x, y, z and w coordinate copied from another 4D vector.
Vector4D() - Constructor for class vector.Vector4D
Initialize 4D vector with x, y, z and w coordinate as 0.
